title: To many applications are tracking your private data!
content: Now that everyone uses cell phones and tablets for everyday things, your private data is being tracked.

title: README Generator now available on github
content: Clone the README Generator onto your computer to easily create a README for each project.

title: MVC using Handlebars
content: By using a simplet templating language like Handlebars, entry level web developers can create full stack web applications!

title: Use Bootstrap to quickly design a website page!
content: Try out Bootstrap to quickly design and create a webpage (or multiple)!  There is a lot of documentation available which makes it easy to quickly format a clean and responsive page.
